long_description: This Yakima fork adapter allows you to mount your 15mm thru axle fork to any fork-mounted bicycle carrier. Adapter measurement: 15mm axle/inside diameter, 110mm axle/tube width. Built-in safety tabs; durable powder-coated finish. Adapter will work with all fork-mounted bike carriers by Yakima, Thule and Rocky Mounts.
short_description: This Yakima fork adapter allows you to mount your 15mm thru axle fork to any fork-mounted bicycle carrier.
